burn(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: To burn all sUSD debt, pass in type(uint256).max for sUSDAmount

params.sUSDAmount: Amount of sUSD debt to burn (set to type(uint256).max to burn all debt)
params.snxAmount: Amount of SNX to sell in order to burn sUSD debt

params._approvedExchange: Approved DEX address to swap on

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.details: Aave flash loan callback. Receives the token amounts and gives it back + premiums.

params.assets: The addresses of the assets being flash-borrowed
params.params: Arbitrary packed params to pass to the receiver as extra information
params.premiums: Fees to be paid for each asset

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferToken(address).details: Can only be called by owner

params.token: Address of token to transfer the balance of

burn(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Burn sUSD debt with SNX using a flash loan

transferToken(address).notice: Transfer a tokens balance left on this contract to the owner

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint256[] memory,address,bytes memory,uint16) external

documentation.text:
@author Ganesh Gautham Elango
 @title Burn sUSD debt with SNX using a flash loan
